entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.5°C

Condition: Mostly Cloudy

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
